title: The Winged scourge
brief_description: Points out that the Anopheles mosquito alone transmits malaria and shows its development from the larva to full growth when it becomes a menace. Various means of combating the mosquito are demonstrated.
description: Points out that the Anopheles mosquito alone transmits malaria and shows its development from the larva to full growth when it becomes a menace. Various means of combating the mosquito are demonstrated.
